com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognizer

Class SpenRecognizerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognizer.SpenRecognizerManager

  • public final class SpenRecognizerManager
extends Object
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenRecognizer instance. All methods only work on Note and Tablet models.
    Since:
    5.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SPEN_RECOGNIZER 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpenRecognizerManager(Context context)
      Creates an handwriting recognizer instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes an SpenRecognizerManager instance.
      SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(SpenRecognizerInfo info)
      Create an handwriting recognizer instance with the specified information from the candidate information list.
      You can get the information by calling getInfoList()
      SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(SpenRecognizerInfo info, String key)
      Create an handwriting recognizer instance with the specified information from the candidate list and the specified key.
      You can get the information by calling getInfoList()
      SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(String className)
      Create an SpenRecognizer instance with the specified class name.
      If you know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without creating a candidate list.
      SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(String className, String key)
      Create an SpenRecognizer instance with the specified class name and key.
      If you already know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without creating a candidate list.
      void destroyRecognizer(SpenRecognizer recognizer)
      Destroy the currently loaded handwriting recognizer plug-in instance.
      List<SpenRecognizerInfo> getInfoList()
      Get the list of available handwriting recognizer plug-ins.
      String getPrivateKeyHint(SpenRecognizerInfo info)
      Get a private key hint for the plug-in.

      • getPrivateKeyHint

        public String getPrivateKeyHint(SpenRecognizerInfo info)
                         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                InstantiationException,
                                IllegalAccessException
        Get a private key hint for the plug-in.
        Parameters:
        info - The SpenRecognizer information object.
        Returns:
        The private key hint.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        InstantiationException - Thrown when the constructor is not accessible for instantiation.
        IllegalAccessException - Thrown when the class methods are not accessible.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the candidate list is not created.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when info is null.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • createRecognizer

        public SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(SpenRecognizerInfo info)
                                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                       SpenCreationFailureException,
                                       Exception
        Create an handwriting recognizer instance with the specified information from the candidate information list.
        You can get the information by calling getInfoList()
        Parameters:
        info - The handwriting recognizer information object.
        Returns:
        The handwriting recognizer instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the handwriting recognizer instance cannot be created.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the candidate list is not created.
        Exception - Thrown if the handwriting recognizer engine returns an error.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • createRecognizer

        public SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(SpenRecognizerInfo info,
                                       String key)
                                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                       SpenCreationFailureException,
                                       Exception
        Create an handwriting recognizer instance with the specified information from the candidate list and the specified key.
        You can get the information by calling getInfoList()
        Parameters:
        info - The handwriting recognizer information object.
        key - The private key.
        Returns:
        The handwriting recognizer instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the handwriting recognizer instance cannot be created.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the candidate list is not created.
        Exception - Thrown if the handwriting recognizer engine returns an error.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • createRecognizer

        public SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(String className)
                                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                       SpenCreationFailureException,
                                       Exception
        Create an SpenRecognizer instance with the specified class name.
        If you know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without creating a candidate list.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the recognition plug-in.
        Returns:
        The SpenRecognizer instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the handwriting recognizer instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the handwriting recognizer engine returns an error.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • createRecognizer

        public SpenRecognizer createRecognizer(String className,
                                       String key)
                                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                       SpenCreationFailureException,
                                       Exception
        Create an SpenRecognizer instance with the specified class name and key.
        If you already know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without creating a candidate list.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the recognition plug-in.
        key - The private key.
        Returns:
        The SpenRecognizer instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when className is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the handwriting recognizer instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the handwriting recognizer engine returns an error.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • destroyRecognizer

        public void destroyRecognizer(SpenRecognizer recognizer)
        Destroy the currently loaded handwriting recognizer plug-in instance.
        Parameters:
        recognizer - The handwriting recognizer instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the handwriting recognizer engine is not loaded.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes an SpenRecognizerManager instance.
        Since:
        5.0.0
